description:
Three sadistic slave trainers are tasked to discipline these cock hungry fuck sluts, and produce a formal staff for the Upper Floor.
Satine Phoenix and Cherry Torn are reduced to component parts of a larger affair. Each knows what her cunt is for, this week. She knows what her mouth is for. They are physically prepared. Torn and Phoenix must now simply surrender their will.
title: The Training of Satine Phoenix, Day Seven
